channel.title: Password on wroot
channel.description: Recent content in Password on wroot

item.title: Online password generation utility from PcTools
item.description: Here’s a good online password generator from PcTools that generates passwords based on various parameters such as password length; letters, numbers, special characters inclusion; hability to exclude similar characters etc. Good to have bookmarked! There’s also desktop version (Windows) of the password generator in the “Password Utilities” software provided by PcTools.
